name: Memory Match For Kids: A Preschool Learning App
name_original: Memory Match For Kids: A Preschool Learning App
description:
Memory Match For Kids takes you classic memory game and adds enjoyable sounds and colorful graphics. Your family can compete for high scores in the least amount of turns and fastest times for each of the 3 difficulty levels. You can reset the scores at any time to keep the competition fresh.

Version 1.4 now supports game center with achievements. 9 achievements in total. Challenge your friends to see who can unlock them all first!

Don't delay, train your toddler's brain to build up concentration while having fun!
